TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ECDiffieHellman extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class ECDiffieHellman Inherits AsymmetricAlgorithm

Docs.summary: Provides an abstract base class that Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm implementations can derive from. This class provides the basic set of operations that all ECDH implementations must support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用作 ECDH 实现的抽象基类。

MemberSignature.Value: protected ECDiffieHellman ();

Protected Sub New ()
protected: ECDiffieHellman();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由派生自 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman> 类的类调用。 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng> 类是当前包含在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]中的唯一实现。 有关如何创建新的椭圆曲线 Diffie-hellman （ECDH）算法的实现的信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman.Create%2A> 方法。

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of an implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

Docs.param: The curve to use to generate a new public/private key-pair.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm with a new public/private key-pair generated over the specified curve.
Docs.returns: A new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 曲线必须验证（即，在传递给 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法时，它必须返回 true。
在 Windows 上不支持特性2曲线。

Docs.param: The parameters for the elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) algorithm.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm with the key described by the specified object.
Docs.returns: A new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 传递到 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法时，必须验证 `parameters` （即，必须返回 `true`）。 不支持隐式曲线上的参数。
在 Windows 上不支持特性2曲线。

Docs.exception: does not validate.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman Create (string algorithm);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman Create(string algorithm) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create (algorithm As String) As ECDiffieHellman
public: static System::Security::Cryptography::ECDiffieHellman ^ Create(System::String ^ algorithm);
static member Create : string -> System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman

Docs.param: The name of an implementation of the ECDH algorithm.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the specified implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.
Docs.returns: A new instance of the specified implementation of this class. If the specified algorithm name does not map to an ECDH implementation, this method returns .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果您开发自己的 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman> 对象实现，则可以使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman.Create%28System.String%29> 方法重载来创建指定您的实现的自定义 `algorithm` 字符串。
`algorithm` 参数指定 ECDH 算法的实现的名称。 以下字符串都引用相同的实现，这是 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]当前支持的唯一实现：
- "ECDH"
- ECDiffieHellman
- ECDiffieHellmanCng
- "System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"
还可以为 `algorithm` 参数提供自定义 ECDH 实现的名称。 如果这样做，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> 对象将使用它来确定是否可以创建 ECDH 对象。

Docs.exception: The parameter is .

Docs.summary: Derives bytes that can be used as a key using a hash function .

Docs.param: The curve used to generate an ephemeral public/private key pair.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, generates a new ephemeral public/private key pair for the specified curve.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `curve` 必须在传递到 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法时验证（即必须返回 `true`），且不能是隐式的。
在 Windows 上不支持特性2曲线。

Docs.exception: does not validate.
A derived class must override this method.

abstract member ImportECPrivateKey : ReadOnlySpan<byte> * int -> unit override this.ImportECPrivateKey : ReadOnlySpan<byte> * int -> unit

Docs.param: The bytes of an ECPrivateKey structure in the ASN.1-BER encoding.
When this method returns, contains a value that indicates the number of bytes read from . This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Imports the public/private keypair from an ECPrivateKey structure, replacing the keys for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只支持 ECPrivateKey 的二进制（BER/CER/DER）编码。 如果值采用 Base64 编码或 PEM 文本格式，则调用方必须在调用此方法之前对内容进行 Base64 编码。

Docs.exception:
The contents of do not represent an ASN.1-BER-encoded PKCS#8 ECPrivateKey structure.
-or-
The key import failed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ImportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey (ReadOnlySpan<byte> passwordBytes, ReadOnlySpan<byte> source, out int bytesRead);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ImportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> passwordBytes, valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> source, [out] int32& bytesRead) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ImportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey (passwordBytes As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte), source As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte), ByRef bytesRead As Integer)
public: override void ImportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey(ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> passwordBytes, ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> source, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % bytesRead);
override this.ImportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey : ReadOnlySpan<byte> * ReadOnlySpan<byte> * int -> unit

Docs.param: The bytes to use as a password when decrypting the key material.
The bytes of a PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo structure in the ASN.1-BER encoding.
When this method returns, contains a value that indicates the number of bytes read from . This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Imports the public/private keypair from a PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo structure after decrypting with a byte-based password, replacing the keys for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密码字节直接传递到由 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 内容指示的算法使用的密钥派生函数（KDF）。 这样，就可以与使用 PBKDF2 （基于密码的密钥派生函数2）处理密码时使用 UTF-8 以外文本编码的其他系统兼容。 此方法只支持 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 的二进制（BER/CER/DER）编码。 如果值采用 Base64 编码或 PEM 文本格式，则调用方必须在调用此方法之前对内容进行 Base64 编码。

Docs.exception:
The password is incorrect.
-or-
The contents of indicate the Key Derivation Function (KDF) to apply is the legacy PKCS#12 KDF, which requires -based passwords.
-or-
The contents of do not represent an ASN.1-BER-encoded PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo structure.
-or-
The contents of indicate the key is for an algorithm other than the algorithm represented by this instance.
-or-
The contents of represent the key in a format that is not supported.
-or-
The algorithm-specific key import failed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ImportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey (ReadOnlySpan<char> password, ReadOnlySpan<byte> source, out int bytesRead);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ImportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<char> password, valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> source, [out] int32& bytesRead) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ImportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey (password As ReadOnlySpan(Of Char), source As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte), ByRef bytesRead As Integer)
public: override void ImportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey(ReadOnlySpan<char> password, ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> source, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % bytesRead);
override this.ImportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey : ReadOnlySpan<char> * ReadOnlySpan<byte> * int -> unit

Docs.param: The password to use for decrypting the key material.
The bytes of a PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo structure in the ASN.1-BER encoding.
When this method returns, contains a value that indicates the number of bytes read from . This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Imports the public/private keypair from a PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo structure after decrypting with a char-based password, replacing the keys for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `source` 的内容指示使用 PBKDF1 （基于密码的密钥派生函数1）或 PBKDF2 （基于密码的密钥派生函数2）的算法时，密码将通过 UTF-8 编码转换为字节。 此方法只支持 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 的二进制（BER/CER/DER）编码。 如果值采用 Base64 编码或 PEM 文本格式，则调用方必须在调用此方法之前对内容进行 Base64 编码。

Docs.exception:
The password is incorrect.
-or-
The contents of do not represent an ASN.1-BER-encoded PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo structure.
-or-
The contents of indicate the key is for an algorithm other than the algorithm represented by this instance.
-or-
The contents of represent the key in a format that is not supported.
-or-
The algorithm-specific key import failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只支持 PrivateKeyInfo 的二进制（BER/CER/DER）编码。 如果值采用 Base64 编码或 PEM 文本格式，则调用方必须在调用此方法之前对内容进行 Base64 编码。

Docs.exception:
The contents of do not represent an ASN.1-BER-encoded PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo structure.
-or-
The contents of indicate the key is for an algorithm other than the algorithm represented by this instance.
-or-
The contents of represent the key in a format that is not supported.
-or-
The algorithm-specific key import failed.

When this method returns, contains a value that indicates the number of bytes read from . This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Imports the public key from an X.509 SubjectPublicKeyInfo structure after decryption, replacing the keys for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只支持 SubjectPublicKeyInfo 的二进制（DER）编码。 如果值采用 Base64 编码或 PEM 文本格式，则调用方必须在调用此方法之前对内容进行 Base64 编码。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此属性的默认（非重写）实现返回字符串 "ECDiffieHellman"。
此属性继承自 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> 的基类。

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SignatureAlgorithm As String

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the signature algorithm.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此属性继承自 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> 的基类。
椭圆曲线 Diffie-hellman （ECDH）算法用于密钥派生，而不是数字签名生成。 因此，此属性将返回 `null`。

Docs.param: The bytes to use as a password when encrypting the key material.
The password-based encryption (PBE) parameters to use when encrypting the key material.
The byte span to receive the PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo data.
When this method returns, contains a value that indicates the number of bytes written to . This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Attempts to export the current key in the PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo format into a provided buffer, using a byte-based password.
Docs.returns: if is big enough to receive the output; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密码字节直接传递到 `pbeParameters`所指示算法使用的密钥派生函数（KDF）。 这样，就可以与使用 PBKDF2 （基于密码的密钥派生函数2）处理密码时使用 UTF-8 以外文本编码的其他系统兼容。

Docs.exception:
The key could not be exported.
-or-
indicates that should be used, which requires -based passwords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `pbeParameters` 指示使用 PBKDF2 （基于密码的密钥派生函数2）的算法，则密码将通过 UTF-8 编码转换为字节。

Docs.exception: The key could not be exported.
